title: Define System Requirements for NeurofeedbackAddictionTherapy
description: Clearly outline functional and non-functional requirements for the NeurofeedbackAddictionTherapy system, including user interface design, data storage, security measures, performance specifications, and integration with external systems where applicable.

title: Design UX/UI for Therapy Interface
description: Create wireframes and design the user interface for the therapy sessions, including onboarding and navigation.

title: Design Database Schema for User Data
description: Create the necessary database schema to store user data and neurofeedback session results.

title: Develop Backend for Data Processing
description: Implement the backend services to process user data and generate neurofeedback signals.
dependencies: Design Database Schema for User Data

title: Build Frontend Components for Therapy Interface
description: Implement the interactive components of the therapy interface based on the designed wireframes.

title: Integrate Frontend with Backend Services
description: Connect the frontend components to the backend services for data processing.
dependencies: Build Frontend Components for Therapy Interface

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user manuals and guidelines for using the NeurofeedbackAddictionTherapy system.

title: Conduct Unit Testing for Frontend Components
description: Perform unit tests on individual frontend components to ensure proper functionality.
dependencies: Build Frontend Components for Therapy Interface

title: Integration Testing of the System
description: Perform integration testing to ensure that all components work together seamlessly.
